item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1384; 08:42PM; 6926 S Bonsallo Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qDTsKO; Vermont-Slauson; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. The building type is updated to a one story, multi-family dwelling. The fire was contained to one unit and the primary/secondary searches found no occupants. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E33 E57 E66 RA257 RA833 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Physical Rescue ; INC#1376; 08:20PM; 14800 W San Fernando Mission Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wGGTlJ; Mission Hills; One vehicle into the wash with two patients. One patient requires extrication and a litter basket operation is being deployed to bring the patients up to the surface for transportation. Both patients (age/gender unknown at this time) are considered in *at least* serious condition due to the mechanism of injury. LAPD Inc# 3885; FS 75; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E7 E75 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA98 T75 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - Vehicle into Wash; INC#1295; 07:33PM; 21400 W Bassett St; MAP: https://bit.ly/36xNbJB; Canoga Park; Firefighters responded to a vehicle in the wash (reportedly went over the bridge) with one patient already out of the vehicle. One patient transported (age/gender/condition unknown). The initial 9-1-1 call was received at 7:09PM. Any media questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 3583. No further details.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; E105 E305 RA72 T105; CH8; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0779; 01:21PM; 10610 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/36Rbz8H; Palms; KNOCKDOWN: 33 firefighters extinguished the fire in 13 minutes (Culver City also on scene assisting) with no injuries reported. Firefighters contained the fire to the unit of origin, defended the additional attached units. Structure Fire; INC#0779; 01:08PM; 10610 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/36Rbz8H; Palms; One story, row of bungalows with one unit well involved. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Culver City Fire also has a structure fire response enroute. Cliff Rescue, San Pedro; INC#0635; 11:59AM; 807 W Paseo Del Mar; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bdMymN; San Pedro; LAFD divers deployed off LAFD Boat 5 and made their way to the rocks to locate the patient. LACoFD Lifeguard ( @lacolifeguards ) was also on scene to assist. The female patient was determined to be deceased on scene. The patient will now be packaged and a ground based, rope system will be used to bring her up. LA County Coroner and LAPD will handle the investigation and identification. No further details. ; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT17 BT3 BT4 BT5 E112 E238 E248 E285 E48 E85 EM13 H0A H0F H1 H3 HA1 HA3 RA101 RA85 RH114 T38 T48 T85 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Cliff Rescue, San Pedro; INC#0635; 11:19AM; 807 W Paseo Del Mar; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bdMymN; San Pedro; Firefighters are working to make their way to a female patient reported (witnessed) to have jumped off the cliff, West of the lighthouse. Once a medical assessment is made, the next steps (rescue vs recovery) will be determined. LAPD Inc# 1667; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT17 BT3 BT4 BT5 E112 E238 E248 E285 E48 E85 EM13 H0A H0F H1 H3 HA1 HA3 RA101 RA85 RH114 T38 T48 T85 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart
